import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './runstyle.css'; const Navbar2 = () => { const [currentText, setCurrentText] = useState("MOVE, SHOP, CUSTOMISE & CELEBRATE WITH US"); const navTexts = [ "MOVE, SHOP, CUSTOMISE & CELEBRATE WITH US", "NEW ARRIVALS FOR YOUR BEST RUN", "MEMBER EXCLUSIVE DEALS" ]; useEffect(() => { const intervalId = setInterval(() => { setCurrentText((prevText) => { const currentIndex = navTexts.indexOf(prevText); const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % navTexts.length; return navTexts[nextIndex]; }); }, 1000); return () => clearInterval(intervalId); // Clean up the interval on component unmount }, []); return (
Running
{/* Hide Filters dropdown */}
{/* Sort By dropdown */}
Shoes Tops & T-Shirts Hoodies & Sweatshirts Jackets Trousers & Tights Shorts Tracksuits Socks Accessories & Equipment
{/* Additional Dropdowns for each option under Sort By */}
Running Shoes Walking Shoes Sports Shoes
Running Tops Casual T-Shirts Workout T-Shirts
Hoodies Sweatshirts
Running Jackets Casual Jackets Sports Jackets
Running Trousers Fitness Tights
Running Shorts Casual Shorts
Running Tracksuits Casual Tracksuits
Running Socks Sports Socks
Running Belts Fitness Bands Hydration Packs
  • {currentText}
); }; export default Navbar;
